name: Armageddondays
0:
”Alexa, open armageddon days”
”Alexa, start armageddon days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: armageddon days
des:
Listen to this Gizmo Girl story with a timeless lesson. 
Gizmo Girl watches a real life Armageddon day in the metaphor of a ball of ants floating on water. Ants are designed by God to live, swim and breathe under water, yet in some strange fear of death, they scurry over each other climbing each other, leaving a trail of dead ants on which live the rest, in constant fear of death. The Armageddon Days?
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
